overview: When she discovers a mysterious crack in the foundation of her workplace, the Copenhagen Opera, cleaner Angeli raises the alarm. She tries to find help, but it turns into a Kafkaesque odyssey: no one at her workplace seems to hear what she has to say, everyone follows the ethos of "the show must go on". The water is rising and Angeli has to find a way to make herself heard in this supernatural doomsday musical.
title: Opera night
